description: End-to-end verification of the SauceDemo homepage load, login form, valid/invalid login flows, inventory display, product images, and add-to-cart button visibility.
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage loads successfully at https://www.saucedemo.com/ with title 'Swag Labs'
Login form is visible with username and password fields
User can login with standard_user / secret_sauce
After login — product inventory page loads at /inventory.html
All product images load correctly — no broken images
Add to cart button is visible on the first product
